unnormalised: Hey, any news on Virat after that nasty fall on 22/07/2024? Hope it's not a repeat of '98, like when Sachin had that shoulder injury. I heard Rishabh is doing well in his NCA rehab, targeting a return by Diwali. Any updates on Bumrah's back too? Last I checked, he was aiming for the T20 World Cup squad, maybe around 14/10/2024. We really need those guys fit for the next series against Australia starting from 09:30 hrs.
normalised: Hey, any news on Virat after that nasty fall on twenty second july two thousand and twenty four? Hope it's not a repeat of nineteen ninety eight, like when Sachin had that shoulder injury. I heard Rishabh is doing well in his N C A rehab, targeting a return by Diwali. Any updates on Bumrah's back too? Last I checked, he was aiming for the T two zero World Cup squad, maybe around fourteenth october two thousand and twenty four. We really need those guys fit for the next series against Australia starting from nine thirty hours.
